lead_paragraph: A militant group’s announcement that it was ending a cease-fire is linked to the government’s failure to keep promises to the oil-producing region, analysts and activists said.

keywords.value: Movement for the Emancipation of the Niger Delta
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: A militant group’s announcement that it was ending a cease-fire is linked to the government’s failure to keep promises to the oil-producing region, analysts and activists said.

headline.main: Unmet Vows Tied to Ebb of a Truce in Nigeria
